headline.main: Soviet Requests U.S. Help; Offers to Pay for Supplies; SOVIET ASKS U.S. TO SELL SUPPLIES

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, July 1 -- The first Russian request for material aid under President Roosevelt's policy of assistance was announced today by Sumner Welles, Acting Secretary of State.
abstract: aid asked by USSR; Welles-Oumansky conf, Wash; Molotoff-Amb Steinhardt conf, Moscow; Welles says USSR will pay cash
snippet: WASHINGTON, July 1 -- The first Russian request for material aid under President Roosevelt's policy of assistance was announced today by Sumner Welles, Acting Secretary of State....

byline.original: By BERTRAM D. HULENSpecial to THE NEW YORK TIMES
